name: Souncloud - Modern Dark
description: A modern take on Sounclouds' eye-searing white theme that has yet to be ported officially from Android. Based on THEN00P's outdated code.
additional_info:
Please feel free to post any requests/ideas. I'd be happy to implement them in the following updates. Changelog: r0.1
  • Some color adjustments have to be polished.
  • There are quite a few UI visual annoyances that could trigger OCD.

discussions.name: Ok this is a good style
